# CRUD Operations Using Django Shell

This document demonstrates Create, Retrieve, Update, and Delete operations
performed on the Book model using the Django shell.

## Create
A book titled "1984" by George Orwell published in 1949 was created.

## Retrieve
The created book was retrieved and all attributes were displayed.

## Update
The book title was updated from "1984" to "Nineteen Eighty-Four".

## Delete
The book was deleted and confirmed by retrieving all books again.
